data.name: lblDiscountRequestTip.Text
data.value:
Seller may provides discounts based certain conditions. You can provide related information and request seller to offer these discount by modify summary price.
    Note, if seller modify summary price according to your request. You can't modify (or delete) product items in cart which belong to same seller, otherwise, the item summary price will restore to original price.

data.name: plDiscountRequest.Help
data.value: Seller may provide discount based certain conditions. You can provide related information and request seller to offer these discount by modify summary price. Note, if seller modify summary price according to your request. You can't modify (or delete) product items in this cart which belong to same seller, otherwise, the item summary price will restore to original price.

data.name: plDiscountResponse.Help
data.value: Seller response to your discount request.

data.name: Tip_DiscountRequest.Text
data.value:
You can try to request seller to offer more discounts as follows (if seller provides):

    1. If the product requires delivery or needs to calculate tax fee, click "Specify Address" button to calculate tax fee (base on your billing country/state) and shipping fee (base on your country/state and shipping method) first, then click "Confirm address and return" button to return.

    2. Enter "Discount Request" below, for example, you can say that you are an old and loyal customer, and should get 10% discount. A mail will be sent to the seller to notify your request.

    3. If seller thinks your request is reasonable, he can change "item summary" according to your request (e.g. if orginal summary is 100, seller can change it as 80 to offer you 20% discount). A mail will be sent back to you.

    4. You can then check out with the new "item summary".

    Note, seller modified price will be restored to original amount if you modify (or delete) items in the shopping cart which belong to same seller, or you change address information like country/state (or shipping method).

data.name: plAddress1.Help
data.value: Enter address 1, value can't be null

data.name: plBillAddressList.Help
data.value: Specify the billing address, click "Edit Address" to edit your billaddress, click "refresh addresses" to refresh this list after modified.

data.name: plShipAddressOption.Help
data.value: These options determine what address to ship the order to.

data.name: lblAuthorizeConfirmMessage.Text
data.value:
With Authorize.Net, you can pay with almost any kind of credit or debit card (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, JCB, Discover, and Diners Club, Entoute..). Please enter your name on card and card number, choose its expiration month/year, also enter the three or four digit number on the reverse on your card as "Card Verification Code", click "Confirm Order" button to check out.

Note that by clicking the "Confirm Order" button below, you are agreeing to site terms of Use.

data.name: Tip_CartError_Stock.Text
data.value: Item "{0}" current stock quantity is "{1}", your order quantity is "{2}", please decrease your quantity (or delete this item), or contact seller to modify stock quantity before check out.

data.name: lblPaypalConfirmMessage.Text
data.value:
Click the button below to confirm your order.

Once you have confirmed your order, you will be transferred to PayPal where you can use your credit/debit card or PayPal account to pay for your order. While redirecting a blank page will be displayed, please wait a moment and do not touch to your browser.

Note that by clicking the button below, you are agreeing to site Terms of Use.

  PayPal allows 3-rd store to defind product name which will be sold, but the product name must be alpha-numeric (a-z, A-Z, 0-9, blank space). So, if current product name is valid (e.g. "Dell Computer t4200"), it will be submitted to PayPal payment center, and you can view that. If it is not valid (e.g. product name is "戴尔电脑"), site will generate a new product name (using "Order" + current date/time), and submit it to PayPal.

data.name: plCSC.Help
data.value: Enter the three or four digit number on the reverse on your card.

data.name: plExpiryDate.Help
data.value: Enter your credit/debit card's expiry date in MM/YY format.

data.name: DifferentReceiverEmail.Text
data.value: Possible fraud, the receiver email is different than the PayPal account ID.

data.name: EmailAlert.Text
data.value: An Instant Payment Notification (IPN) has been received from PayPal containing wrong information. This could be a possible fraud. Please consult your site log for details.

data.name: EmailIPN.Text
InvalidIPN.Text
data.value: Possible fraud, the IPN transaction is invalid. Some fields required are not present.

data.name: Mail_Order_CannotBeProcessed.Text
data.value: If, for whatever reason, your order cannot be processed, then one of our customer services representatives will contact you shortly.

data.name: Mail_Order_EmailHeader.Text
data.value:
Thank you for placing an order with {0}.
Please find below an order number and a summary of your order. You can check the status of your order at {1} or download your files if what your ordered is software or digital files. If you have any questions about your order, please feel free to contact us at {2}.

data.name: Mail_Order_Items.Text
data.value: {0} x {1} @ {2}, Tax {3}, Shipping Fee {4}, Sum {5}, Invoice ID {6}

data.name: OrderSuccess.Text
data.value: Your order has been successfully paid, thanks for your support.

data.name: Mail_Order_TermsOfUse.Text
data.value: This invoice is subject to our terms of use.

data.name: Mail_Order_Thanks.Text
data.value: Once again, thank you for your order.

data.name: PaymentStatus_Canceled_Reversal.Text
data.value: A reversal has been canceled. For example, you won a dispute with the customer, and the funds for the transaction that was reversed have been returned to you.

data.name: PaymentStatus_Denied.Text
data.value: You denied the payment. This happens only if the payment was previously pending.

data.name: PaymentStatus_Failed.Text
data.value: The payment has failed. This happens only if the payment was made from your customer's bank account.

data.name: PaymentStatus_Reversed.Text
data.value: A payment was reversed due to a chargeback or other type of reversal. The funds have been removed from your account balance and returned to the buyer.

data.name: PaymentType_echeck.Text
data.value: This payment was funded with an eCheck.

data.name: PaymentType_instant.Text
data.value: This payment was funded with PayPal balance, credit card, or Instant Transfer.

data.name: PendingReason_address.Text
data.value: The payment is pending because your customer did not include a confirmed shipping address and your Payment Receiving Preferences is set yo allow you to manually accept or deny each of these payments. To change your preference, go to the Preferences section of your Profile.

data.name: PendingReason_echeck.Text
data.value: The payment is pending because it was made by an eCheck that has not yet cleared.

data.name: PendingReason_intl.Text
data.value: The payment is pending because you hold a non-U.S. account and do not have a withdrawal mechanism. You must manually accept or deny this payment from your Account Overview.

data.name: PendingReason_multi-currency.Text
data.value: You do not have a balance in the currency sent, and you do not have your Payment Receiving Preferences set to automatically convert and accept this payment. You must manually accept or deny this payment.

data.name: PendingReason_other.Text
data.value: The payment is pending for an unknown reason. For more information, contact PayPal Customer Service.

data.name: PendingReason_paymentreview.Text
data.value: The payment is pending while it is being reviewed by PayPal for risk.

data.name: PendingReason_unilateral.Text
data.value: The payment is pending because it was made to an email address that is not yet registered or confirmed.

data.name: PendingReason_upgrade.Text
data.value: The payment is pending because it was made via credit card and you must upgrade your account to Business or Premier status in order to receive the funds. This can also mean that you have reached the monthly limit for transactions on your account.

data.name: PendingReason_verify.Text
data.value: The payment is pending because you are not yet verified. You must verify your account before you can accept this payment.

data.name: PlacedOrder.Text
data.value: You recently placed an order with {0}

data.name: ReasonCode_buyer-complaint.Text
data.value: A reversal has occurred on this transaction due to a complaint about the transaction from your customer.

data.name: ReasonCode_chargeback.Text
data.value: A reversal has occurred on this transaction due to a chargeback by your customer.

data.name: ReasonCode_guarantee.Text
data.value: A reversal has occurred on this transaction due to your customer triggering a money-back guarantee.

data.name: ReasonCode_refund.Text
data.value: A reversal has occurred on this transaction because you have given the customer a refund.

data.name: RequiresPayment.Text
data.value: IMPORTANT: Your order now requires payment. If you wish to pay via a specific method, or would like to cancel your order, please contact us at {0}, or simply reply to this message.

data.name: VerificationFailed.Text
data.value: Possible fraud, PayPal verification result is: INVALID.

data.name: WrongOrderInfos.Text
data.value: Possible fraud, order not found or order infos are incorrect.

data.name: Mail_Vendor_Tip.Text
data.value: Congratulations, there is a order for your product.

data.name: Mail_Vendor_PriceInfo.Text
data.value: Unit Price:{0}{1} Quantity:{2}{3} Shipping Fee:{4}{5} Tax Fee:{6}{7} Summary:{8}{9}

data.name: Mail_DiscountRequest_PriceInfo.Text
data.value: UnitPrice:{0}, Quantity:{1}, Shipping Fee:{2}, Tax Fee:{3}, Summary:{4}.

data.name: Mail_DiscountRequest_Thanks.Text
data.value: Please login to {0} for more detail. Thanks for your support.

data.name: Mail_DiscountRequest_Tip.Text
data.value: There is a discount request to your product.

data.name: AuthNet_ErrorCardInformation.Text
data.value: Please fill in your credit card information.

data.name: AuthNet_ErrorCardNotValid.Text
data.value: The credit card information is not valid!

data.name: AuthNet_ErrorNotSecured.Text
data.value: Page is not secured with SSL, you cannot use Authorize.Net without SSL.

data.name: AuthNet_ErrorPaymentOption.Text
data.value: Gateway settings have not been set. Please contact your System Administrator.

data.name: AuthNet_ReasonCode11.Text
data.value: A duplicate transaction has been submitted.

data.name: AuthNet_ReasonCode12.Text
data.value: An authorization code is required but not present.

data.name: AuthNet_ReasonCode13.Text
data.value: The merchant API login ID is invalid or the account is inactive.

data.name: AuthNet_ReasonCode14.Text
data.value: The Referrer or Relay Response URL is invalid.

data.name: AuthNet_ReasonCode6.Text
data.value: The credit card number is invalid.

data.name: AuthNet_ReasonCode7.Text
data.value: The credit card expiration date is invalid.

data.name: AuthNet_ResponseCode3.Text
data.value: There has been an error processing this transaction.

data.name: AuthNet_ResponseCode4.Text
data.value: This transaction is being held for review.

data.name: Error_AuthNet_CardNotValid.Text
data.value: The credit card information is not valid!

data.name: NoPaymentGateway.Text
data.value: There is no valid payment gateway, please check it.

data.name: lblShipAndTaxTip.Text
data.value: Shipping and tax fee will be changed after you specify address.

data.name: lblManualConfirmMessage.Text
data.value:
Manual check out enables you to check out offline. You can finish transaction as follows:

    1. You order status will be changed as "awaiting payment" after you click "Confirm Order". A mail will be sent to seller about your order.

    2. Contact seller in anyway you want, and pay your money to seller, e.g, wire transfer, deposit.

    3. Seller then change your order status as "paid" after receive your money, and do necessay work (for example, shipping).

    4. If you order software or digital files, you can download them after your order status has been changed as "paid".

data.name: lblOrderSummary.Text
data.value: Product Total:{0}, Shipping Fee:{1}, Tax Fee:{2}, Summary:{3}

data.name: plOrderMemo.Help
data.value: Enter specification request for this item here. For example, if you buy a clothe and you want seller ship the white color style, you can input here. Seller will receive these information when he view this order.

data.name: plShipMethod.Help
data.value: Select shipping method you want, different shipping method will have different fee.

data.name: Error_NoShipMethod.Text
data.value: Current there is no shipping method available for your selected country, please contact seller.

data.name: ManualOrder.Text
data.value: Your order has been successfully sent to seller, please contact seller to pay your money. Thanks for your support.

data.name: DineroMail_Status_Error.Text
data.value: The payment has canceled or failed.

data.name: DineroMail_Status_Pending.Text
data.value: The payment has pending. Please contact site administrator when you paid is complete.

data.name: lblDineroMailConfirmMessage.Text
data.value:
DineroMail payment gateway enables you to send money via DineroMail easily. You can finish order as follows:

    1. Your order status will changed as "awaiting payment" after you click "Confirm Order" and paid on DineroMail. A mail will be sent to seller about your order information.

    2. Seller then change your order status as "paid" when he confirm that he already receive your money, and do necessay work, like shipping.

    4. If you order software or digital files, you can download them after your order status has been changed as "paid".

data.name: plTitle.Help
data.value: Enter your title (optional), e.g, enter "IT Manager" or "Ceo" or "Doctor" or something else.

data.name: plTitle1.Help
data.value: Enter your title (optional), e.g, enter "IT Manager" or "Ceo" or "Doctor" or something else.

data.name: lblGoogleCheckout_Auto.Text
data.value:
Google Checkout enables you to send money easily. You can finish order as follows:

    1. Click "Google Checkout" button below, site will redirect you to Google Checkout site.

    2. Click "Place your order now " button that appears beneath your order total. The ensuing page will display a link to return to current site, don't forget to click that link to return site, this is vital to finish transaction.

    3. Your order status will be changed as "paid" after redirect to current site. A mail will be sent to seller about your order information.

    4. If you order software or digital files, you can download them by click "Buyer Center - My Products" .

data.name: lblGoogleCheckout_Manual.Text
data.value:
Google Checkout enables you to send money easily. You can finish order as follows:

    1. Click "Google Checkout" button below, site will redirect you to Google Checkout site.

    2. Click "Place your order now " button that appears beneath your order total. The ensuing page will display a link to return to current site, don't forget to click that link to return site, this is vital to finish transaction.

    3. Your order status will be changed as "awaiting payment" after redirect to current site. A mail will be sent to seller about your order information.

    4. Seller then change your order status as "paid" when he confirm that he already receive your money, and do necessay work, like shipping.

    5. If you order software or digital files, you can download them by click "Buyer Center - My Products" after your order status has been changed as "paid".

data.name: lblVendorSelect.Text
data.value: Tip: your cart contains products which belong to multiple sellers, you need to check out one by one. Select seller:

data.name: Tip_EnablePayPal_Site.Text
data.value: To charge recursive, site administrator must enable PayPal payment gateway in "Cp_Admin sub module - Admin Control Panel - Configurations - Store Settings - PayPal payment gateway". Please contact site administrator to solve it.

data.name: Tip_EnablePayPal_Vendor.Text
data.value: To charge recursive, seller must enable PayPal payment gateway in "Cp_Admin module - Seller Center - My Profile - Payment - PayPal payment gateway". Please contact site administrator to solve it.

data.name: Tip_InvalidCartItem.Text
data.value: Your cart contains more than 1 item which require recursive payment, this is invalid. Please contact site administrator to solve it.

data.name: Tip_OrderMemo.Text
data.value: Enter your postscript (requirements/memo) below. For example, enter "whilte color" to remind the seller to delivery white color clothes.

data.name: Mail_Subscribe_EmailHeader.Text
data.value:
Thank you for pay an subscribe with {0}.
Please find below a summary of your subscribe. You can check the status of your subscribe at {1} or download your files if what your subscribed is software or digital files. If you have any questions about your subscribe, please feel free to contact us at {2}.

data.name: Mail_Vendor_Subscribe_PriceInfo.Text
data.value: Unit Price:{0}{1} Quantity:{2}{3} Shipping Fee:{4}{5} Tax Fee:{6}{7} Summary:{8}{9}

data.name: Mail_Vendor_Subscribe_Tip.Text
data.value: Congratulations, there is a subscribe fee received for your product.

data.name: plCoupon.Help
data.value: Enter coupon (promo code) to get discount (if you have).

data.name: Tip_Coupon.Text
data.value: Enter coupon (promo code) to get discount (if you have).

data.name: Tip_InvalidCoupon.Text
data.value: Invalid coupon, or this coupon doesn't apply to selected product (option), please check it.

data.name: plStripeCardCvc.Help
data.value: Enter the three or four digit number on the reverse on your card.

data.name: Tip_Payment_Stripe.Text
data.value:
With Stripe, you can pay with almost any kind of credit or debit card: (1) U.S. businesses can accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, JCB, Discover, and Diners Club. (2) Canadian, European, and Australian businesses can accept Visa, MasterCard, and American Express. Please enter your card number, choose its expiration month/year, also enter the three or four digit number on the reverse on your card as "Card Verification Code", click "Confirm Order" button to check out.

Note that by clicking the "Confirm Order" button below, you are agreeing to site terms of Use.

data.name: Tip_Payment_StripeTest.Text
data.value: In test mode, you can enter 4242424242424242 as "Card Number", and select any "Card Expiration Year" and "Card Expiration Month", also enter any 3 or 4 number (e.g. 123) as "Card Verification Code", to simulate a successful transaction.

data.name: Tip_HideDiscountRequest.Text
data.value: If you are a site administrator and don't want to see the "Discount Request" area, click "Cp_Admin sub module – Admin control panel – Configurations – Store Settings", uncheck "Store Settings – Enable Modify Order Price" option to remove it.

data.name: Tip_CartError_MinSellQuantity.Text
data.value: Item "{0}" minimum sell quantity is "{1}", your order quantity is "{2}", please increase your quantity (or delete this item), or contact seller to modify minimum sell quantity before check out.

data.name: Tip_InvalidQuantity.Text
data.value: Invalid quantity, please check if it is lower than the product minimum sell quantity.

data.name: lblAlipayConfirmMessage.Text
data.value:
Click the button below to confirm your order.

Once you have confirmed your order, you will be transferred to Alipay.com where you can use your credit/debit card or Alipay account to pay for your order. While redirecting a new page will be displayed, please wait a moment and do not touch to your browser.

Note that by clicking the button below, you are agreeing to site Terms of Use.

data.name: imgEdit.Text
data.value: Edit this item, change quantity (order memo, etc) or submit discount request (if seller provides).
